parameters: The sane wouldn't venture into these
forests. You've come with a purpose.
Yes, I am. And you are?
My name is Teiko. We are closely intertwined in this
My family is a host to the same immunity,
So it's true... other lineages with the immunity
I met your father some time ago.
He told me to drop one of his prized
possessions near your cell. It was a sword.
Do you have it with you?
You mean the Greatsword of Nintai? I had to pick it up
off of a creature, named the Forest Savage. They found
the Greatsword and snatched it from the Fairies.
I see. One small mistep aside, I'm here to make sure
you fulfill your goal. The goal to dethrone Aldreith.
I made a deal with the Dust Fairies to
protect the Greatsword until you woke. Looks like they
couldn't keep their end of the deal.
The Nintai and Teiko families were very
close some generations ago, but now we
are nothing but disbanded mice, unfortunately.
I guess you could call me your unofficial bodyguard.
Perfect. So as my bodyguard, you will be
I cannot. I have lost my legs, and am
dependent on my wooden staff to balance
However, I will be contacting you through my telepathy
throughout your journey. Sort of like a voice inside
You'll need to make your way out of the
To leave Ruby Forest, you'll need to take
Yes, and a deadly force, indeed. You will

Your father was a brilliant wolf. He
watched over me like his daughter...
He was impailed by one of Aldreith's
You should at least be aware, I felt.
You passed out for a few minutes.
I cast a light spell to heal you.
I'm afraid so, but you know what he'd
want you to finish for him.
Right. I need to get moving.
Wait! You just woke. Rest a bit. You'll
need it for the fight against Ravaged Mind.
Sit next to this log and get some rest.
I'll heal you some more in the meantime.
I hope the information I've given you will
Thank you, Teiko. I won't forget this
Make sure your father's sacrifice wasn't
in vain. You must defeat him.
The door to the Ravaged Mind is just ahead.
When you're ready, you can step through.
